list.musicians: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) ?Band WHERE { ?MusicianItem a ?SubClass. ?MusicianItem rdfs:label ?Musician. FILTER(LANG(?Musician) = "en"). OPTIONAL { ?MusicianItem music:birthDate ?Birth_Date . } OPTIONAL {?BandItem rdfs:label ?Band. FILTER(LANG(?Band) = "en"). ?BandItem music:hasComponent ?MusicianItem .} FILTER(?SubClass != music:Musician && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Musician})} group by ?Musician ?Birth_Date ?Band
list.musicians_only_bands: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date ?Band WHERE { ?Band music:hasComponent ?Musician . OPTIONAL {?Musician music:birthDate ?Birth_Date}} ORDER BY ?Band
list.musicians_only_solists: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) WHERE { ?Musician a ?SubClass. OPTIONAL { ?Musician music:birthDate ?Birth_Date . } OPTIONAL {?Band music:hasComponent ?Musician .} FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?Musician music:componentOf ?Band } && ?SubClass != music:Musician && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Musician})} group by ?Musician ?Birth_Date
list.albums: SELECT ?Album ?Owner ?Sales ?Certificate ?Release_Date WHERE { ?item music:hasAlbum ?AlbumItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album . FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en"). BIND(?item AS ?Owner) OPTIONAL {?CertificateItem rdfs:label ?Certificate . FILTER(LANG(?Certificate) = "en").?AlbumItem music:hasCertification ?CertificateItem. } { ?AlbumItem music:salesCount ?Sales. } OPTIONAL { ?AlbumItem music:releaseDate ?Release_Date. } }
list.songs: SELECT ?Song ?Composer ?Album WHERE {OPTIONAL { ?AlbumItem a music:Album. ?AlbumItem music:contains ?SongItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en")} ?SongItem music:writtenBy ?Composer . ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song . FILTER(LANG(?Song) = "en")}
list.genres: SELECT ?Genre (COUNT(?Song) AS ?Songs) WHERE { ?Genre a music:Genre. ?Song music:hasGenre ?Genre. } GROUP BY ?Genre
list.events: SELECT ?Event (group_concat(?Host; separator=", ") as ?Main_Hosts) ?City ?Nation ?Continent WHERE { ?Host music:hostOf ?EventItem. ?EventItem music:locatedIn ?City. ?City music:locatedIn ?Nation. ?Nation music:locatedIn ?Continent. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. FILTER(LANG(?Event) = "en")}GROUP BY ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent
list.labels: SELECT ?Music_Label ?Musician ?Producer WHERE { ?Music_Label_Item music:hasHired ?Musician. ?Musician a music:Musician. OPTIONAL { ?Music_Label_Item music:hasHired ?Producer. ?Producer a music:Producer. ?Music_Label_Item rdfs:label ?Music_Label. FILTER(LANG(?Music_Label) = "en")} }

list_filter.events: SELECT ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent ?Attendance WHERE {{ ?EventItem music:locatedIn ?City. ?City music:locatedIn ?Nation. ?Nation music:locatedIn ?Continent. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. ?EventItem music:eventHasTag ?Tag. ?Tag rdfs:label ?TagLabel. ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Event. ?EventItem a ?SubClass. ?SubClass rdfs:label ?SubClassLabel. ?EventItem music:attendance ?Attendance. FILTER(LANG(?Event) = "en" && LANG(?TagLabel) = "en" && LANG(?SubClassLabel) = "en" && LANG(?Event) = "en" && {}) }} GROUP BY ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent ?Attendance
list_filter.songs: SELECT ?Song ?Composer ?Album ?Genre WHERE {{OPTIONAL {{ ?AlbumItem a music:Album. ?AlbumItem music:contains ?SongItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en")}} ?SongItem music:writtenBy ?Composer . ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song . ?SongItem music:hasGenre ?GenreItem. ?GenreItem rdfs:label ?Genre FILTER(LANG(?Song) = "en" && LANG(?Genre) = "en" && {})}}
list_filter.albums: SELECT ?Album ?Owner ?Sales ?Certification ?Release_Date WHERE {{ ?Owner music:hasAlbum ?AlbumItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album . ?AlbumItem music:salesCount ?Sales.  ?AlbumItem music:releaseDate ?Release_Date. ?AlbumItem music:hasCertification ?CertificationItem. ?CertificationItem rdfs:label ?Certification . FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en" && LANG(?Certification) = "en" && {})}}

single.event: SELECT ?Event ?Start_Date ?End_Date ?Attendance ?Type ?Manifest (group_concat(?Tag; separator=", ") as ?Tags) WHERE {{ ?EventItem a music:Event. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. ?EventItem music:eventStartDate ?Start_Date. ?EventItem music:eventEndDate ?End_Date. ?EventItem music:attendance ?Attendance. ?EventItem music:manifest ?Manifest. ?EventItem music:eventType ?Type. ?EventItem music:eventHasTag ?Tag. FILTER(REGEX(?Event, '^{}*', 'i') && LANG(?Event) = "en")}} GROUP BY ?Event ?Start_Date ?End_Date ?Attendance ?Manifest ?Type
single.event_songs: SELECT ?Song ?Genre ?Performed_By WHERE {{ ?EventItem a music:Event. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?EventLabel. ?EventItem music:hasSongPerformed ?Song. ?Song music:hasGenre ?Genre. ?Song music:writtenBy ?Performed_By. ?Performed_By music:hostOf ?EventItem. FILTER(REGEX(?EventLabel, '^{}*', 'i') && LANG(?EventLabel) = "en")}}
